amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to strike sections 213, 214, 220, 221, 224, 404, 405, 544, 549, and 550.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike sections within the bill pertaining to immigration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wasserman Schultz amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 220 (Roll no. 443).

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Wasserman Schultz.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Wasserman Schultz amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 220 (Roll no. 443).
